column3: “I recently came across this strain and all I have to say is DAMN this stuffs DANK! It's a very potent cross of UK Cheese and White Widow, I use mine for nighttime use as it will put me to sleep it is a very pungent strong strain that has climed up the top of my ladder quickly. Smells like dank cheese smokes like heaven, great for almost everything honestly. If you see this strain in your local dispensery DEFINITELY g...”

“A cross of two really nice strains, White Widow and Cheese, via Zambeza seeds.  The skunky-cheesy funk is very much present and there in equal parts is the Widow's hashy-earthy scent ... you can tell this is going to be potent at first smell.

Looks more like the Widow as well, with a medium-darker green appearance and reasonably dense cone shaped nuggets - a little bit of the gold look from the Cheese and the pale w...”
“Flavour reminds me of artificial white cheese covered popcorn. Very pungent, funky and earthy. Effects: body high/warmth, controlled appetite, moderate energy, very subtle dry mouth.”
“Now this is a real nice strain. Cheesy cheesy yumm yumm with a punch. Great mood elevator and pain reliever.”
“Strong shyt for the average chiefer, has early onset and Late hits making it a fast acting and long-lasting kinda Hi. A Must Try!”

“I always look for a Cheese when I want a robust Indica vibe but without the generic Kush couch-lock. White Cheese is one such, and it provides relaxation but with the classic White Widow creative-happiness. I bought this most recently at Eden, who had it as a 60/40 Sativa hybrid. I would differ and go with 60/40 Indica, due to the subdued stimulating effects. 
Experienced smokers should look for a stronger Indica lik...”
“Very good strain for stress, and mood elevation. Very easy grow, covered in trichs, and reeks of cheese. Good smoke”
“Very nice head buzz. I was calm, relaxed, and bubbly. Body buzz in a way that made me feel numb in a good way.  Great smoke.”
“Very good strain for stress, and mood elevation. Very easy grow, covered in trichs, and reeks of cheese. Good smoke”
“Loved this bud - good daytime strain keeps you focused and relaxed.  Good CBD content for inflammation issues.  Taste is amazing cheese smell has you wanting more and more”
“Very nice smell! Probably the closest to a cheese smell I've had. Smoke was smooth and high was nice and mellow. Gave me a good energetic buzz :)”

“When I first tried a cheese strain it was U.K cheese. White Cheese is a good cross. Not as good as U.K cheese but definitely up there. Smoke is a little harsher than others but its got a great taste. Lemony/chocolatey. Great aftertaste. It smokes very slow in comparison to other strains. Rolls very smoothly. Very nice headbuzz, body buzz to the shoulders. Long lasting high and smells amazing. Guys, any cheese strain ...”

“This strain is the bomb. Great all over. Last long smells great feels great. 10
..”
“Very nice smell! Probably the closest to a cheese smell I've had. Smoke was smooth and high was nice and mellow. Gave me a good energetic buzz :)”
“Nice but I found it to be a bit weak for me.”
“Talkative lmao”
“It's very relaxing and good. Makes you happy and chill. Recomend to everybody.”
“Really powerful high. Warm and embracing”
“Really good head high... felt happy and focused after having it in a bong.... no paranoia or laziness. A overall pleasant experience”

“As per usual cheese strains at hit or miss, if you love the cheese then this ones for you. It has a pungent cheese flavour and aroma. This strain is a hybrid so it does not deliver an overwhelming indica lockdown like the other cheese strains do.”
“Earthy taste”

“I bought this strain at a dispensary, being the HUGE cheese lover iam (especially old nice well curated cheese rather then the grocery store brand or largely mass marketed plastic stuff)  (u get the point im a cheese snob) as a preface after reading many of the comments prior, ive never ever been one of those people who notice/get strong tastes/aromas from weed despite usually buying mediocre-excellent quality weed f...”

“This strain is the bomb. Great all over. Last long smells great feels great. 10
..”
“heavy hitting indica woah”

“When I first tried a cheese strain it was U.K cheese. White Cheese is a good cross. Not as good as U.K cheese but definitely up there. Smoke is a little harsher than others but its got a great taste. Lemony/chocolatey. Great aftertaste. It smokes very slow in comparison to other strains. Rolls very smoothly. Very nice headbuzz, body buzz to the shoulders. Long lasting high and smells amazing. Guys, any cheese strain ...”
“Nice but I found it to be a bit weak for me.”
“Very nice smell! Probably the closest to a cheese smell I've had. Smoke was smooth and high was nice and mellow. Gave me a good energetic buzz :)”
“Very nice smell! Probably the closest to a cheese smell I've had. Smoke was smooth and high was nice and mellow. Gave me a good energetic buzz :)”
“Loved this bud - good daytime strain keeps you focused and relaxed.  Good CBD content for inflammation issues.  Taste is amazing cheese smell has you wanting more and more”

“This bud grabbed me by the nose and demanded that I pay attention; she smells so good that you gotta keep her in an air-tight because that dank cheese aroma loves to flow. 

Hit a bag off of my Volcano and had an awesome head rush and sustained head high which spreads into a very nice body buzz. 

Great strain for a happy and and stress free Saturday morning. Awesome I-Dominant that flirts nicely with its Sativa attr...”
“super chilled out mellow buzz. A+ smell and taste.”
“Fire!!!! Very good strain loved it”
“A very potent smoke with a pungent smell and distinctive taste. Great appetite stimulator and overall stress reliever. perfect for a mid afternoon or even a morning smoke.”
“Nighttime smoke in my opinion. Overall I really enjoyed. The taste is amazing and I smoked through my volcano and was couch locked for a long while. Would recommend”
“nice taste very strong smell of nice fresh cheese sweet  .very good taste give you hit of cheese and sweet tasty strain very strong stone effect”
“Very good. :)”

“When you crack open the jar, it smells like gods vagina! Just so pungent, and cheesy but slightly sweat and skunky, that any cheese lover will love for it's awesome 60% indica anti-anxiety muscle relaxant affects. Its a awesome strain for any one who is a indica fan but also doe's not won't to doze off.”
“Really good euphoric feeling. I was touching carpet and wanted so much sex. Also talkactive and happy feeling”
